description: Patient's contact serial numbers (CSNs) that are linked to the price estimate.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the price estimate record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PATIENT_CSN
columns.description: The estimate's link to the patient's contact serial numbers (CSN).  This is used to link visits to the estimate record.
